message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000.  This is a great price considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,350,000.

Bob, I understand your offer, but I'm still hoping for a bit more to make this deal work for me. How about $1,400,000?  This price is still well below your estimated value and will leave us both happy.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,375,000.
